评论概述: Pretty and comfortable shirt for work
类型: Color: Black & Orange Floral Long Sleeve ShirtsSize: X-Large
评论详情: I love that this shirt is on the dressier side so I can wear it to work but it is still really comfortable and could be worn casually.  The style of the shirt is flattering to those of us who have mom stomachs.  It does remind me of a maternity shirt but I still like the flowy nature of the bottom of the shirt and the empire waist.  It makes me feel less conscious about my stomach.  I have gotten several compliments about the shirt from coworkers and my husband.  The pattern is pretty.  I like the detail of the elastic at the cuffs with the ruffle at the wrist.  I appreciate that the sleeves are flowy but not puffy at the shoulder.  There is stretch to this shirt and as other reviewers pointed out the pattern does stretch out as does the color so make sure you pick a size where the shirt isn't stretching too much over the bust.
Absolutely love this shirt!! It is so flattering and long enough to wear with leggings. The sleeves and neckline are so cute! I want to buy in every color!

This is such a flattering top. It fits perfectly and looks great. The sleeves are a tiny bit short (just above wrist bone) but that's not an issue for me.  The fabric has some stretch, is lightweight, doesn't wrinkle, not hot, and is long enough to cover rear end. The gathering at the wrist is stretchy and well-done. The design is only printed on the front of the fabric and the back is white but you can only see it if the bottom of the sleeve flips up.  I wear a size 16-18 top and ordered a large.  I have an average bust, so if you have extra up top, consider sizing up.
